mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, review.* from ( select * from review order by re_no desc) review ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1)*10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} *10)
mapper.update: update review set readcount=readcount+1 where re_no = #{re_no}
UPDATE review A SET A.rev_like = ( SELECT count(B.re_no) FROM revlike B WHERE A.re_no = B.re_no )
mapper.select: select DISTINCT s.sp_name from reservation r, spot s where s.sp_no = #{sp_no}
select * from (select rownum rnum, review.* from ( select * from review where id=#{id} order by re_no desc) review ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1)*10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} *10)
select * from ( select * from review order by readcount desc) where rownum =1

select * from ( select rownum as rnum, re_no, res_no, subject, content, readcount, r_date, re_file, score, rev_like, id, del, re_file2 from ( select * from review order by readcount desc)) where rnum = 2
